title: cmd/gc: internal compiler error when inlining method value
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
"go get github.com/AlekSi/gobug/..." with Go from tip.

What is the expected output?
None.

What do you see instead?
# github.com/AlekSi/gobug/gobug
Soft/GOPATH/src/github.com/AlekSi/gobug/gobug/main.go:4: internal compiler error:
missing typecheck:
.   AS l(4)
.   .   NAME-main.rcvr u(1) a(1) l(4) class(PAUTO) tc(1) used(1) PTR64-*gobug.Dialer
.   .   CLOSUREVAR l(4) x(8+0) PTR64-*gobug.Dialer

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Darwin Airbook.local 12.3.0 Darwin Kernel Version 12.3.0: Sun Jan  6 22:37:10 PST 2013;
root:xnu-2050.22.13~1/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64

Please provide any additional information below.
cronos at IRC said it works for him on Linux with 6g.
